articles.description: Every July 1 from 2011-2035, the New York Mets dole out $1.19 million to Bobby Bonilla, who hasn't played for them since 1999.
articles.content:
Sports Pulse: Players, celebs and politicians tip their hats in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Negro Leagues.
USA TODAY
Happy Bobby Bonilla Day, especially to Bobby Bonilla.
